title: [Feature] Quick Connect in CAPS
author: sohnaych
body_snippet:
As you know we've servers with short names and they're often in CABs both on Virtualization paltform as well as DNS and computer/host names to make it easy to ready.

When we paste or type in CAPs in Quick Connect, it would lowercase and then connect.. 

Would be nice to connect as typed in Quick Connect. Thanks

iterations.description: UriBuilder.Host lowercases hostnames; Quick Connect should preserve user-typed case for servers with uppercase DNS/NetBIOS names

comments.author: sohnaych
comments.snippet: any timelines when this will be fixed or with which version?

notes:
AI triage (claude): UriBuilder.Host lowercases hostnames; Quick Connect should preserve user-typed case for servers with uppercase DNS/NetBIOS names
Approach: In CreateQuickConnect(), use the original connectionString directly for Hostname and Name instead of uriBuilder.Host, since port parsing is already done manually before uriBuilder assignment
